attributes.action: Stop the Increasing Number of Imigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop Imigrants entering Britain from none EU countries. Imigrants entering Britain take Brittish jobs and therefore cause Britains to live on the streets. If it is not possible to STOP the increasing number of imigrants entering Britain then at the very least a Quota system should be introduced. If we want Britain to be a better place we should unite together and stop imigrants taking what we have worked hard to earn and achieve.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
